item.title: About
item.description: I’m Raunaq, I like to talk about technology, programming, food, sports, photography (and some other things). I currently live in Bengaluru and work as Associate Principal ML Engineer at Revionics. Here’s a non-exhaustive list of stuff I’ve done over the years, each condensed to a single sentence: [2023] Working with Kubernetes and large scale ML Deployments at Revionics [2022] Briefly worked as a Contractor with OpenAI on GPT 3 [2022] Worked as an ML Engineer in the Core Team at Turing.
